Description: Fragment of shoulder of Attic(?) black-figured pottery closed vase. Two black lines separate a floral frieze above (part of a palmette and a dot of glaze) from a black-figure frieze of which only part of the head and shoulders of a male to right is preserved; red for beard, fringe and perhaps rest of hair (worn).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2195)
